greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Alternating sum of the seventh powers of the first n Fibonacci numbers.
comment: Natural bilateral extension (brackets mark index 0): ..., 2177594, 80442, 2317, 130, 2, 1, 0, [0], -1, 0, -128, 2059, -76066, 2021086 ... This is A098533-reversed followed by A128696.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..680
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (-20,294,819,-2912,728,1365,-252,-22,1).
formula: Let F(n) be the Fibonacci number A000045(n).
mathematica: a[ n_Integer ] := If[ n >= 0, Sum[ (-1)^k Fibonacci[ k ]^7, {k, 1, n} ], Sum[ -(-1)^k Fibonacci[ -k ]^7, {k, 1, -n - 1} ] ]
program: (MAGMA) [(&+[(-1)^k*Fibonacci(k)^7: k in [0..n]]): n in [0..30]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Jan 17 2018
results.author: _Stuart Clary_, Mar 23 2007
